#define ASSERT_FILE_OFFSET ( offset,
OP   ) 
Value:
do { if (offset > ASSERT_MAX_SIZE_MB << 20) {                           \
        CERROR("bad file offset %llu > %llu\n", offset,                 \
               ASSERT_MAX_SIZE_MB << 20);                               \
        libcfs_debug = ~0UL;                                            \
        OP;                                                             \
}} while(0)

#define ASSERT_PAGE_INDEX ( index,
OP   ) 
Value:
